articles.description: The BCCI has confirmed that India’s Avesh Khan, who hurt his left thumb on Tuesday on Day 1 of the warm-up match representing ‘County XI’, will be taking no further part in the three-day game. Avesh opened the bowling and conceded 41 off 9.5 overs, but left t…
articles.content: Avesh, who was picked in the Indian squad as a standby, took to the field representing County XI and opened the bowling for the hosts. He started waywardly, being taken apart by the Indian openers, a… [+222 chars]
